extendedInfo.description: zMooth lets you use gestures to mimic your device's hardware keys (back, home and menu), you will be able to use very intuitive gestures to navigate your device. If gestures are not working or you having some issue please check zMooth Preferences->Help->FAQ. This should solve most problems, If not just contact support at Preferences->Help->ContactSupport.zMooth is unobtrusive and uses minimum amount of screen space but very easy and intuitive to use. If you use for couple of days you won't even think about using the buttons.After you install the app you will see a blue area at the bottom of the screen, swipe left on this area to go back, swipe right for menu and gesture a up-arrow(^) for home.zMooth will also save your hardware keys from being prematurely degrading as you will be using them a lot less. It might also slightly increase your battery life as you won't be turning on button lights and triggering hardware button circuits.The pro version will add more features, including being able to turn off screen, change width, colors of the gesture area.Note: zMooth requires a rooted android device.Keywords: zMooth, gesture, keys, hardware, buttons, softkeys

reviews.title: Must Have
reviews.comment: Really cool! Saves your buttons if they are physical buttons. Curious to see what\'s in the full version but I ain\'t got no moneys.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Absolutely the most needed, practical, user friendly app, I have EVER needed or used from All the Apps available..!!. SIMPLY PHENOMENAL! 10/10 :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working with ICS
reviews.comment: Was my fav app...doesn\'t work with ICS/JB anymore. The dev might have stopped updating it may be bcuz ICS comes with inbuilt soft keys. But this one is way better. Unlike ICS onscreen keys this doesn\'t take screen space. I really hope it gets an update.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Works flawlessly on droidX so far. I love my phone just not the hard buttons. This solved that for me. If no issues i will be purchasing full app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: If it could only hide navigation bar,,
reviews.comment: If it could only hide navigation bar it would be great!  I have galaxy nexus, and i would love to get rid of the navigation bar taking place.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. Would give it five stars if it had an option to reposition the gesture area.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Dev, great job. Going to work with it some more and purchase full version.

reviews.comment: Menu button wore out on my hd2, this app saved me having to buy another. Thanks!

reviews.comment: Wow this app is amazing. Will consider getting pro version. A+

reviews.comment: Love it...very practical in the dark when hard key illumes out.

reviews.title: Great app for everybody who is trying to save buttons  their phone.

reviews.comment: Simply amazing! Prefer this over button Savior. Thank you so much!

reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very nice substitute for keys in nook color, especially for miui. I like it much more than softkeys and boot saviour.

reviews.title: Perfect for arthritis/carpal tunnel!
reviews.comment: Inherited a Dx with the dreaded hard keys ... ouch!  Found Zmooth Lite & life is good with Galnet ICS.  :-D

reviews.title: Significant battery drain
reviews.comment: THis should have been a good app.. drained my battery on idle mode, went to sleep last night and checked my bat it\'s 72%, when I woke up, my phone is dead...my bat life is normal before installing this app... now sigificant battery drops..uninstalled. Still a nice app, maybe its not really compatible with a GB XXJVK SGS rooted with Chainfire\'s. thanks anyway.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent app, makes navigation on my phone so much easier.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very nice for xperia play. Home gesture works others dont but still it saves your hard keys.

reviews.comment: Not work with SE Xperia Arc: Back & Menu function. Home & Lock screen fuction is good

reviews.title: JEREMY
reviews.comment: This app works perfect for droidx rooted. For heavy users a must saves buttons. No issues at all
